questions.question_text_1: Ramu puts up a stall for Diwali Light (Diya) every year. He builds a Diya at a cost of Rs. 1 and earns Rs.2 by selling each Diya. Any Diya not sold by Diwali will be discounted to 50 Paisa. From his experience, Ramu knows that the demand is Uniformly Distributed within [800, 1000] units. Then answer the given subquestions:
question_texts: Ramu puts up a stall for Diwali Light (Diya) every year. He builds a Diya at a cost of Rs. 1 and earns Rs.2 by selling each Diya. questions.question_text_1: Slipline Co. requires 1500 units of plastic ribbon per month. Each plastic ribbon costs Rs. 27 in the market. Placing an order costs Rs. 150 to Slipline Co. and the inventory carrying charges work out to 20% of the unit ribbon cost per year . Calculate the given subquestions:
question_texts: Slipline Co. requires 1500 units of plastic ribbon per month. Each plastic ribbon costs Rs. 27 in the market. Placing an order costs Rs. 150 to Slipline Co. and the inventory carrying charges work out to 20% of the unit ribbon cost per year . Calculate the given subquestions:

questions.question_text_1: What should be the order quantity which minimizes the total cost to Slipline Co.
